```{r, include =T, eval = F, class.source="bg-success"}

                header = .user_header,
                sep = .user_sep,
                dec = .user_dec,
                stringsAsFactors = .user_sAF)

BASE
```

```{r, echo= F, eval = T, class.source="bg-success"}
BASE
```


```{r, include =T, class.source="bg-success"}
# Aislamos una variable en particular de la base de datos.
VR <- BASE[,eval(selected_var_pos)]
VR
```

<br>

```{r, include =T, class.source="bg-success"}

mean(VR)
```

<br>

<br>
